name: ibmi-agentic
description: IBM i agentic coding test environment

repos.name: ibmi-agentic
repos.description: Example repo for traditional 5250 and RPGOA development

docker_config.post_clone_instructions:
# Run touch-only build to create dummy build files.
RUN cd /workspace/ibmi-agentic && \
    CODERMAKE_LICENSE_PATH=/home/coder/.codermake/license.json IBMI_BUILD_LIBRARY=container_setup_build IBMI_HOST=dummy IBMI_USER=dummy codermake -t && \
    chown -R coder:coder /workspace

launch_urls.name: Genie (Classic 5250 Skin)
launch_urls.description: Profound UI Genie with Classic 5250 Skin
